Exposing Spirit.name: Exposing Spirit
Exposing Spirit.flavor: Your spirit companion lashes out, leaving an aura around your foe that exposes a previously hidden weakness.
Exposing Spirit.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. The target gains vulnerable 10 against one damage type of your choice until the end of your next turn.

Animus Strike.name: Animus Strike
Animus Strike.flavor: Your spirit companion lashes out in a devastating strike, causing your opponent to reel in pain. Now, the foeâ€™s every attack has become another opening for your allies.
Animus Strike.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target hits one of your allies with an attack, the target takes damage of the type you chose equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Animus Strike.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier damage of the type you chose and ongoing 10 damage of the type you chose (save ends).

Symbiotic Spirits.name: Symbiotic Spirits
Symbiotic Spirits.flavor: A shimmering spirit attaches to your enemies, peeling away their natural and magical defenses and imparting them to your allies.
Symbiotic Spirits.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. When you use this power, choose an enemy you can see. Each ally within the zone gains resist 10 to all damage types to which that enemy has resistance or immunity.
